description: During the last few months we have spent a good amount of time working with Wagtail, a really cool CMS built on top of the well-known Django framework.

name: Getting started in Wagtail, a newcomer's perspective
description: Having used Drupal almost exclusively as my main tool of choice for a while now, I was asked to put together a build using Wagtail. By @kiwimind.

name: Présentation de Wagtail, le dernier CMS Django
description: Wagtail est un CMS relativement récent dans l’écosystème Django. Pour autant, son jeune âge ne l’empêche pas de posséder de nombreuses fonctionnalités que nous découvrirons dans cet article.

name: Getting Started With Wagtail
description: Working extensively with Wagtail and the surrounding community, we have discovered a range of common pitfalls developers run into when beginning to deliver with Wagtail.

name: An Introduction to Wagtail by Eloise "Ducky" Macdonald-Meyer
description: This talk is an introduction to Wagtail, a content management system built on the Python web framework, Django.

name: DjangoCon US 2015
description: Wagtail - Yet Another Django CMS by Tom Dyson - Tom will explain why his agency decided to build a new CMS, share some lessons learned in running a growing open source project, and outline Wagtail's roadmap to version 2 and beyond. Slide deck.

name: Wellington Wagtail CMS Meetup
description: Meet Wagtail by Josh, Jordi and Rich, from the Springload dev team - An introductory session to Wagtail to showcase the main features it has to offer.

name: DjangoCon US 2016
description: Atomic Wagtail by Kurt Wall – Brad Frost's atomic design principles are taking the way we design the web by storm. I'll explain what Wagtail is, how you can use it with atomic design principles, and some hurdles you might run into along the way with suggestions on how to help.

name: PyCon Australia – Comparing Wagtail, Django CMS and Mezzanine by Adam Brenecki – This talk explores the different approaches, strengths and weaknesses of each CMS, and what they mean for you as a developer and for your content editors.
Wagtail — еще одна CMS на Django by Mikalai Radchuk
description: This talk is an introduction to Wagtail in Russian.

Podcast.init Episode 58
description: Wagtail with Tom Dyson - In this episode Tom Dyson explains how Wagtail came to be created, what sets it apart from other options, and when you should implement it for your projects.

name: Wagtail screencasts: Creating and displaying pages in Wagtail
description: This video will show you how to create and display pages using the Wagtail CMS.

name: Draftail extensions – custom entities tutorial
description: Step-by-step tutorial to make extensions for Draftail.

name: Wagtail Wednesdays #01
description: Adding Help Text to Improve Wagtail Editor Experience - Catherine talks you through the steps you can take to add some useful supplementary text fields to the Wagtail admin.

name: Wagtail Wednesdays #02
description: Customising Rich Text Features in Wagtail - Catherine talks you through the steps you can take to customise your rich text editors to control which features are available to your content editors.

name: Wagtail Wednesdays #03
description: Using tabs to create a cleaner admin interface - Chris talks you through using tabs to organise fields.

name: Wagtail Wednesdays #04
description: Organising Images and Documents using Wagtail Collections - Kieran talks you through the process of organising your images and documents into collections.

name: Wagtail Wednesdays #05
description: How to organise your fields and streamline the editor experience - Chelsea talks you through the process of organising your fields to make it easier to manage them and streamline the editor experience.

name: Wagtail Wednesdays #06
description: Creating & using custom settings in your wagtail site - Chris talks you through setting up and using custom site settings.

name: Wagtail Wednesdays #07
description: How to Enable the Wagtail Styleguide - It’s a really helpful resource that takes no time at all to enable and it allows you to check your components against the guidelines and shows all the available Wagtail icons.
